---
title: "a.features.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines feature flags for a namespace called "a". It specifies two flags: one of type VARIANT_FLAG_TYPE and another of type BOOLEAN_FLAG_TYPE.

## Symbols

### Namespace
#### Description
The namespace is defined as "a". This likely serves as an identifier or grouping mechanism for the flags defined in this file.

### Flags
#### Description
An array of flag definitions, each containing key, name, and type properties.

#### Internal Logic
The file defines two flags:
1. A flag with key "one", name "One", and type VARIANT_FLAG_TYPE
2. A flag with key "two", name "Two", and type BOOLEAN_FLAG_TYPE

### Flag: one
#### Description
Defines a feature flag named "One" with a variant type.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Identifier for the flag, set to "one" |
| name | string | Human-readable name for the flag, set to "One" |
| type | string | Type of the flag, set to VARIANT_FLAG_TYPE |

### Flag: two
#### Description
Defines a feature flag named "Two" with a boolean type.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Identifier for the flag, set to "two" |
| name | string | Human-readable name for the flag, set to "Two" |
| type | string | Type of the flag, set to BOOLEAN_FLAG_TYPE |

## Configuration
This YAML file serves as a configuration for feature flags. Here's a breakdown of the configuration options:

| Option | Type | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------------|
| namespace | string | Defines the namespace for the flags, set to "a" |
| flags | array | List of flag definitions |
| flags[].key | string | Unique identifier for each flag |
| flags[].name | string | Human-readable name for each flag |
| flags[].type | string | Type of the flag (VARIANT_FLAG_TYPE or BOOLEAN_FLAG_TYPE) |

This configuration file likely serves as input for a feature flag system, defining the available flags and their properties for the namespace "a".
